channel.title: Tropical Algebra on verreld7
channel.description: Recent content in Tropical Algebra on verreld7

item.title: GSoC24 @Sagemath: Final Report
item.description: Overview This summer I participate in Google Summer of Code (GSoC) project: Implementation of Tropical Polynomials and its Corresponding Tropical Hypersurfaces. My primary task was to implement tropical polynomials in Sagemath, where I focused on creating new classes that extend polynomial implementation to support coefficient from tropical semirings, along with several methods to manage various functionality. Additionally, I implemented a class for tropical varieties, which facilitates the visualization of tropical hypersurfaces for multivariate tropical polynomials.
